select a.user_acct userAcct, a.user_name userName, a.user_sex userSex, a.user_phone userPhone, a.user_mail userEmail, a.user_idcard userIdCard from t_sys_user a where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.user_role = 1
and a.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
order by a.create_user desc
